name: master_microsoft_exchange:_hands-on_it_training_program
description: Develop expert-level skills in configuring and managing Microsoft Exchange email systems, with a specific focus on ensuring secure and efficient mail flow through Send Connector management.

activities.description: Install and configure a basic Microsoft Exchange environment. Ensure all necessary services are running and accessible. Validate the setup by connecting to the Exchange Admin Center.
success_criteria: Microsoft Exchange environment is successfully installed.
Access to the Exchange Admin Center is verified.

activities.description: Using PowerShell, perform data cleaning tasks on a provided dataset of email logs. Remove duplicates, correct erroneous data entries, and export the cleaned dataset.
Set up Azure Monitor to visualize Exchange server performance data. Create dashboards that track key metrics such as email throughput and server uptime.
success_criteria: Dashboards are created in Azure Monitor.
Key performance metrics are effectively displayed.

activities.description: Create and configure basic Send Connectors in your Exchange environment. Set routing configurations to ensure outbound mail is correctly relayed to specified domains.
Implement recommended security configurations in Exchange Admin Center (EAC) to protect against common email threats. Include SPF, DKIM, and DMARC configurations.
success_criteria: SPF, DKIM, and DMARC are set up.

activities.description: Using Microsoft Exchange Toolbox, troubleshoot and resolve common mail flow issues in a provided scenario, such as delayed email delivery or message rejections.
success_criteria: Identified and resolved mail flow issues.

activities.description: Deploy and validate Send Connectors in a comprehensive Exchange environment. Use PowerShell scripts for automation and ensure robust configuration for different email routing scenarios.

activities.activity_name: Integrate SMTP Relay for External Email
activities.description: Configure an SMTP relay to allow integration between Microsoft Exchange and an external SMTP server. Validate the communication by sending test emails.
success_criteria: Test emails are delivered to external servers.

activities.activity_name: Monitor and Optimize Send Connector Performance
activities.description: Use the Microsoft Exchange Toolbox to monitor Send Connector performance. Identify bottlenecks and optimize configurations to improve mail flow efficiency.
success_criteria: Send Connector performance is effectively monitored.

plan_spec.user_prompt: Develop expert-level skills in configuring and managing Microsoft Exchange email systems, with a specific focus on ensuring secure and efficient mail flow through Send Connector management.
